title: PERM BANNED :P

replies.body: ...yeah if you had prior bans or restrictions on your account, this could definitely get you perma banned. I don't see what's so confusing about this.
If you ever see words in all % signs, that's a pretty good indicator of why you were banned
I got perama ban also people report for salty reason shit company!!!!! I deserve a chat ban not a fucking Perma

The fact that you didn't post your chat logs in your deleted thread already shows that **you knew & admitted to being excessively toxic & decided to not post your chat logs to hide your embarrassment.**

So good luck making a new account.

wtf I could show them to you!! yea delted because It was in the wrong post!! this company is so full of shit it's unreal!! yea ban people who sup you with money!! this company but nothing without paying for stuff smh

> [{quoted}](name=Better Than Ezra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MNY5Q2NX,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-02-18T08:58:23.139+0000)
>
> wtf I could show them to you!! yea delted because It was in the wrong post!! this company is so full of shit it's unreal!! yea ban people who sup you with money!! this company but nothing without paying for stuff smh


"Could", yea sure. You can just post it along with your thread since the thread itself is 100% pointless to read to begin with.

You do know this type of attitude in your comment is the one & only reason why you got permabanned so easily. Plus, at least this proves that Riot isn't a moneyface to be banning toxic spendthrift such as yourself.

you know why you got BANNED??

stop using table seasonings as insults, and use gameplay/skill and destroy the enemy that way

"key board hero"
